ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately heals one ally by <unbreak>40%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>320</unbreak>.
ItemBGDesc: Orange-flavored pills to cure children's colds. They say that the first batch was so tasty that many boisterous children took too much of it. Hence, many Children's Fragrant Orange Pills on the market now contain a great deal of bitterness to their flavoring. "Wahhh, Mama, why does this pellet smell so sweet but taste so bitter..." "Because that's life, silly child."
